Actions.Name: Protect your PDF with a password
Actions.Description: You can protect the file by prompting for a password when you open the PDF file. This is useful for highly confidential files.

Actions.Name: Add text watermark
Actions.Description: By inserting a watermark such as [Confidential] on each page of the PDF, you can make the viewer understand the characteristics of the material.

Actions.Name: Merge multiple PDF files into one PDF
Actions.Description: This is effective when you want to combine PDFs from multiple departments into one pdf file as meeting materials.
